alert.note: Alert for Northwest Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 8:03AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...LINE OF STRONG THUNDERSTORMS APPROACHING CENTRAL MASSACHUSETTS AND NORTHEAST CONNECTICUT... At 802 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Palmer to Rocky Hill. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Heavy rain may cause minor flooding. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Brimfield around 810 AM EDT. Warren and West Brookfield around 815 AM EDT. Sturbridge and Brookfield around 820 AM EDT. North Brookfield, Andover and East Brookfield around 825 AM EDT. Mansfield, Coventry, Spencer, Leicester and Oakham around 830 AM EDT. Auburn and Paxton around 835 AM EDT. Worcester, Holden, West Boylston and Chaplin around 840 AM EDT. Shrewsbury, Grafton, Boylston and Hampton around 845 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
